name: iluminese
0: ”Alexa, turn on the living room light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With ilumine.se services you have the control of your home lighting in your hands.

Control your ilumine.se switches through Alexa. Turn on, turn off, change light intensity without leaving your couch. Check if you forgot any light on and turn it off from wherever you are.

To use this Skill, you'll need at least one TRR12 switch. You can purchase one at: https://www.ilumine.se/comprar

To set up your device to access the internet, you'll need to use the ilumine.se app at https://app.ilumine.se/. The manual with links to the app and all the information you'll need to complete the electrical installation and set up your device is at https://manual.ilumine.se

You'll also need a Google or a Facebook account to link your switch to Alexa. More account types are going to be added soon.
